note.p: Birth: St George's Court, Clerkenwell, England (23 November 1705)
Death: Hampstead Road, London (09 January 1766)
Burial Place: The chancel of the church of St Margaret Pattens, Eastcheap
Profession: Clergyman, Church of England
Education: DD (1753, Marischal College, Aberdeen)

Career: Ordained deacon (1730); ordained priest (1731); Rector, Ulting, Essex (1732); Rector, Siddington near Cirencester (1744); Rector, St Michael Wood Street, London (1744); Rector, St Margaret Pattens, Eastcheap, London (1746);
Memberships: FSA (1735)
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 20/02/1735
Council: Sec 1752-1765
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB
